H0.text: Collecting rain water is an activity that requires the use of safety goggles to protect the eyes.

H1.text: Measuring air temperature requires the use of safety goggles to protect the eyes.

H2.text: Classifying flowers requires the use of safety goggles to protect the eyes.

H3.text: Pouring vinegar requires the use of safety goggles to protect the eyes.

A4.text: Combines impact resistance with side shields to prevent chemical splashes reaching the eyes.

A5.text: They are used in chemistry laboratories and in woodworking.
